categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Governor of Galidraan was a Human male who was appointed to the position by the Galactic Republic in 44 BBY.

That year, he hired the True Mandalorians to deal with political protesters to his rule; at the same time, under the advice of the Death Watch, he told the Jedi that the Mandalorians were butchering civilians. A Jedi task force under Dooku eradicated the True Mandalorians; the Governor took the armor of the survivor, Jango Fett, and sold him into slavery.
Two years later, Fett returned to reclaim his armor, forcing the Governor to tell him the whereabouts of Tor Vizsla, the Death Watch leader.
